```{r}
# linear regression model 
model <- lm(price_usd ~ ., data = df)
summary(model)
```


```{r}
library(car)
vif(model) 
```


```{r}
# drop non-significant variables and fit linear regression model again
model1 <- lm(price_usd ~ make_year+mileage_kmpl+engine_cc+fuel_type+owner_count+color, data = df)
summary(model1)
```


```{r}
vif(model1)
```
